TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RetryExponential extends Microsoft.Azure.EventHubs.RetryPolicy
Public NotInheritable Class RetryExponential Inherits RetryPolicy

Docs.summary: RetryPolicy implementation where the delay between retries will grow in a staggered exponential manner. RetryPolicy can be set on the client using . RetryIntervals will be computed using a retryFactor which is a function of deltaBackOff (MaximumBackoff - MinimumBackoff) and MaximumRetryCount
